titleStmt.title: The miss display'd, with all her wheedling arts and circumventions in which historical narration are detected, her selfish contrivances, modest pretences, and subtil stratagems / by the author of the first part of The English rogue.
titleStmt.author: Head, Richard, 1637?-1686?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by the several booksellers,

notesStmt.note: "The epistle to the reader" signed: R.H.
Written by Richard Head. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
